roleset.name: saving money

role.descr: entity not spending money (money saver, beneficiary)

example.name: with LOC
example.text: you could try posting this on the moneysaving in marriage and relationships board ?

example.name: with arg1
example.text: With these settings in place, individuals can expect to see money-saving of 40 to 80 dollars per year.

example.name: adjectival
example.text: But while their actions are utterly incomprehensible, a lot of what they do is moneysaving.

roleset.note: MONEYSAVING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, save-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls bill-54.5. (from moneysaving.01-n)
Arg 3 not included due to redundancy. (from moneysaving.01-n)
